outline:
Tanjur Dpe bsdur ma Bruno Lainé
1 AT0001 vol.001 - 1-12 khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa bi shiSh+Ta baH Colophon: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA de bA dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ slad kyi ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
P4CZ10507mainauthormtho btsun grub rje P00KG07267panditasarvajnadeva P20translatorrin chen mchog
2 AT0002 vol.001 - 13-112 khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bi she Sha sta ba nA ma TI kA khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba/ b+haM ga la'i yul gyis slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dzA ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yid srubs zla ba'i gtsug dang gos gser can/ rig byed byed po dga' byed grog mkhar pa/ rgyas pa rgyal dpog pa dang sa yi bu/ thub pa rkang mig phur bu lha min rjes/ skyob pa nyid mor byed pa'i rgyud 'khrungs pa/ srid gsum bla ma shAkyA'i rgyal po de'i/ rnam par thar la bskrun min der bstod pa/ de yi 'grel pa de 'dir rdzogs par bas/ dge ba de yis srid pa'i ljongs rgyu pas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i thibs par 'khyams gyur pa/ mu stegs byed kyi mun pa 'joms byed pa'i/ rgyal ba nyin mor byed par bdag gyur cig / khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa las/ bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'grel pa'i rgya dpe ma rnyed nas/ dus phyis shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal sa skya'i dgon par sbyar pa rdzogs so
P2548mainauthorshes rab go cha P9840panditajarandhana P753translatorrin chen bzang po P4404revisorkun dga' rgyal mtshan
3 AT0003 vol.001 - 112-116 thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa sarba dz+nye ma hA sh+wa ra sto traM nA ma thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bram ze'i dge bsnyen mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
P4CZ10507mainauthormtho btsun grub rje P9840panditajarandhana P753translatorrin chen bzang po
4 AT0004 vol.001 - 117-121 lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa de wa a ti sha ya sto traH lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa / slob dpon bde byed bdag pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ban+de dpal rtsegs rak+Shi tas gtan la phab pa'o
P4CZ10508mainauthorbde byed bdag po P00KG07267panditasarvajnadeva P2JM5translatorrma thog rin chen P8182translatordpal brtsegs

chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

sngar bod kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams kyis chos zhus pa'i dus su/ bla ma dam pas chos ston pham babs gnang ba'i nyen bar bod kyi dge ba'i bshes rnams kyis mdo bton pa la/ bla ma dam pas lo tsA ba la khong 'don pa de ci yin gsungs pas/ lo tsA bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lags zhus pas/ 'o na bod du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po dar na sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa de bden pa yin no/ snying po'i don gyi gdams ngag shes sam gsungs pa la/ skye mang bde chen bud ba smyon pa'o/ ba la su zhag mnyan du yang / gal te smyan pa'i chag la bden pa yang srad thugs la dgongs nas su/ mthun pa'i grags pa rnams kyis ma bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu/ gal te stod pa thabs yin na/ de tsho lo tsA bas ma 'tshal zhes lan btab pa la/ 'o na ngas khyed rnams la gdams ngag bstan gyis gsungs nas/ snying po'i don gyis gdams ngag gnang ba zin ris bris nas nan tan bya pa yin no/ bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi pad ma'i sbrang rtsi smyo chu 'thungs nas su/ skye med bde chen bung ba smyon pa'i kha la su zhig mnyan du yod/ gal te smyon pa'i tshig la bden pa yod srid thugs la dgongs nas su/ mthun pa'i grogs po rnams kyi mi bden na yang don 'di dgongs par zhu/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan med phyir/ thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin/ lta ba rnams las legs rnams dang / bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi/ bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa bstan/ srid zhi mnyam nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum/ 'gro ba'i bde sgrub thabs mkhas ston par byed/ gzhung gi bdag nyid rin chen lta bu la/ dad dang gus pas yang yang phyag 'tshal lo/ phan sems spro dgas bris pa'i 'grel pa 'di/ gang zag dam pa rnams kyi phyag tu brgyud pa dang / bstan pa'i bya ba mdzod pa bdag gi smon lam yin/ chos nyid bden pas de pas/_stobs bcu mang ba'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_lhar bcas skye dgu'i phan bde dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi la rgyas shing yun du gnas par mdzad pa'i sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po spyan snga rin po che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams cad las rnamapar rgyal ba'i lha'i zhal snga nas legs par bsgyur ces bka' lung dan gamathun rkyen bzang po stsal ba la brten nas/_legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po kA la pa dang tsan+d+ra pa'i 'grel pa dang bcas pa dag thos shing cha shas tsam khong du chud la/_sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyi dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul phyogs tsam mthong ba dpal zhwa lu'i btsun pa 'gos lo tsA ba gsum pa dge slong d+ham pA la b+ha dra zhes bya bas gsung rab rin po che'i ming gi cha rnams la ma rtogs 'khrul pa bsal ba dang /_dri ma med pa'i gtsug lag gi tshul phyogs tsam gsar du bstan pas bstan pa rin po che'i sgo thas cad nas mi nub cing 'phel ba dan gabacas pa'i rten ma dang / ma hA mA ya'i dka' 'grel yon tan ldan pa la sogs pa bod rnams kyi tshul bzhin mi rtogs par dgongs nas ma bsgyur ba snang ba bzhin bzhag ming so so nas rgya gar skad dang bod skad shan sbyar bas/ skabs don 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa go ba la shin tu phan par snang ba ni rgya dpe la med na'ang / 'dus pa'i 'grel pa don gsal du ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni chings shig pa'o zhes sogs bsgyur snang ba ltar skad gnyis ka bkod de bshad/ 'bri bsnan gyi dbang gis bar skabs su mtsham sbyor ba'i tshig phrad dang rnam dbye rnams bod skad la ji ltar bde bas bla thabs su bsnan/ sgra'i sgrub tshul nyung zhing de ltar brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po brgyad kyi nang tshan de rnams kyi nang nas kyang go don cho ga sogs phul du phyin pa mdor na sgra'i gtsug lag thams cad kyi phyi mo lta bur gyur pa 'o skol gyi ston pa mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud sogs su lung bstan pa'i bram ze chen po pA ti ni la 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis dngos su stsal ba/ pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs rig zig tu bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rang cag gangs ri'i khrod pa rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dam pa 'phags pa phyag na pad+mo nyid gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sde tshangs sras bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mnyam med pa'i thugs rje'i gzer gyis bskyangs shing / paN+Di ta mched la gser dngul zho grangs brgya phrag du ma sogs ci 'dod kyi yo byad mtha' dag 'bad med du bstsal te/ bka' 'phangs la'ang khyod kyis gzhung bod du bsgyur ba dang / 'grel pa'i go don dper brdzod zin bris bu 'debs pa sogs gyis shig ces bka' gnang ba thob par brten/ dam pa gang de'i gzhal du med pa'i bka' drin las brda sprod pa'i ring lugs la cung zad tsam sbyangs pa bka' 'bangs kyi tha chung gtsang bstod 'dar gyi sa'i char se'i rigs las skyes pa ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub bam/ ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rjer bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyoms las pas/ 'phags yul ku ru k+She trar bram ze gtsang ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta ba la b+ha dra dang / paN+Di ta go gu la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du gzhung gi sgra sgrub dang go don dper brjod sogs legs par nyan te gzhung bod du bsgyur/ slob dpon chen po rA ma tsan+d+rasa mdzad pa'i 'grel pa prakri ya ste rab tu bya ba zhes pa gzhir bzhag kun bshad sogs cho ga rtogs dka' ba rnams la slob dpon mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis zur brgyan ti cung zad rgyas par byas/ rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te/ me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nyag sum cu rtsa gcig bsre ba rnam 'phyang zhes pa sa po khyi lo rang lo nyer lngar sleb pa chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar 'go ba rtsams/ kun ldan zhes pa lcags bya nag pa zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa pa shi'i sgrub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grwa chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs rgya cher bshad pa don gyi de kho na nyid ces slob dpon blo gros bstan pas mdzad pa 'di/ sngar gangs can du mdzod kyi 'grel bshad slob dpon blo gros bstan pas mdzad pa gnam lcags thogs zer zhes bya ba yod do/ zhes mkhas pa rnams la de tsam grags pa ma gtogs ma 'gyur pa las/ 'di'i rgya dpe chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa gzhon nu dpal pa'i phyag tu byung ba/ rje nyid mdzad pa thar phyin pas 'gyur mdzad pa ma grub pa las/ bstan pa rin po che la gcig tu gces spras mdzad cing lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'dren pa dam pa mtshungs med chos kyi rin po che zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas thugs dgongs rnam par dag pas bka' gnang ste/ 'di nyid bod skad du bsgyur bar nus sam zhes gsungs pa las/ bar skabs su hor kong cung zad lus pa 'dug na'ang sngar mngon pa mdzod rtsa 'grel dang 'grel bshad rgyal po sras dang gang spel la sogs pa 'gyur 'dug pa 'di dag gi tshig don la lar gtugs/ sngon gyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis chos bsgyur tshul dang sgra'i gzhung lugs phyogs tsam rtogs pas phal cher ba bod skad du bsgyur nus pa 'dra zhes gsol ba la/ de lta na bstan pa'i bya ba yin pas cis kyang bsgyur ba legs/ dpang lo tsA ba lta bu'i 'gyur la'ang hor kong sngags su lus 'dug cing / da phyis gzhan gyi rdzogs par 'gyur pa yang dga' bas bsgyur cig ces dka' gnang zhing mthun rkyen stsal te/ zhwa lu lo tsA ba d+hArma pA la b+ha dra zhes pas 'di'i rgya dpe ngo bo dang / dpe dbang gyi rgya dpe stag lung nas gnyis pa'i smad dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i stod rnams ma gtogs tshang ba zhig rnyed pa dang rang 'grel gyi rgya dpe dang sngar smos pa'i bod dpe rnams la gtugs shing dpyad de sngon gyi mkhas pa rnams kyi dkas bcad gzhin gzhis kha lhun grub gling dang lhun grub lha rtse nas 'go brtsams te shar phyogs kong po'i sa'i cha dga' ldan ma mo'i gtsug lag khang du rdzogs par sgyur ba'i yi ges pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yo ga sangs rgyas 'phel zhe bya bas bgyis so/ da dung 'di'i rab skabs su lus po hor kong rnams las cung zad mchan bus gsal bar byas pa la'ang / don gyi 'grel pa rtogs dgos yod pa dang 'gyur nor 'khrul mchis pa rnams sgra dang mngon pa'i gzhung lugs mthar phyin pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi bzod cing dpyod par gsol lo
